alert.note: Alert for Montour; Northumberland; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:14PM EDT until July 24 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montour County in central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... Northeastern Union County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 314 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Columbia, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milton, Watsontown, Riverside, New Columbia, Allenwood, Exchange, Mooresburg, Delaware Run, Spruce Run Reservoir, West Milton, Turbotville and McEwensville. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Mile Run and Buckhorn exits, specifically from mile markers 204 to 224. This includes Interstate 180 from mile markers 1 to 7. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
